text:
No matter how many times I see it,
the costumes are so cool and stylish!

With these Venetian masks, putting them on and off,
it adds such a mysterious vibe, it's definitely great!
Haha, I'm glad you like them.

Hehe, we're excited about all the other costumes too,
I just can't contain my excitement!

Wearing these costumes, I can't help but think about
what would make the audience happy~

...Where was Venice again?
Was it in Africa?

It's in Europe... Italy, to be exact. They have a
famous carnival where participants wear those.

Oh, really...?
If there's a festival like that, I'd like to see it~!

The movements during the live performances
might be helpful as a reference!

You could look it up on video sites or go to the
library for research, I'll pick out a few for you.
